recap_documents.description: OPINION AND ORDER re:  27     MOTION  to Dismiss . filed by   Empire HealthChoice HMO, Inc.,   Empire HealthChoice Assurance, Inc.    For the foregoing reasons, Plaintiffs' motion to dismiss is GRANTED. Plaintiffs' claims are dismis sed, but Plaintiffs are granted thirty (30) days from the date of this Opinion and Order to amend their Complaint. If an amended complaint is not filed by April 28, 2025, the Court will order that judgment be entered in favor of the Defendants. The Clerk of Court is respectfully directed to close the gavel at Dkt. 27.    SO ORDERED.       (Signed by Judge Jennifer L. Rochon on 3/28/2025) (Amended Pleadings due by 4/28/2025.)  (ar)
